fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
Upon your appearance, an announcement will be posted of your appearance
If someone visits you, they have to roll 40 d6's
If they get less than 20 6's they die
If you kill someone, you may once visit someone to have them visit you. This can be done as many times as you have killed
If someone survives your bombardment of dice, they will be spared from all furhter kills and win with you, because they honestly deserve it at those odds
